医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
非洲地区疟疾传播风险下降幅度可能超出此前预期一系列环境和水文模型表明，由于 21 世纪的气候变化，非洲面临疟疾传播风险的地区可能会比之前预期的减少更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/African-regions-at-risk-for-malaria-transmission-may-decline-more-than-previously-expected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/African-regions-at-risk-for-malaria-transmission-may-decline-more-than-previously-expected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d1125df-936f-4cb2-a053-0686b5aa3512 Thu, 09 May 2024 22:25:17 -0400 African regions at risk for malaria transmission may decline more than previously expected
联合免疫疗法可增强恶性胶质瘤患者的免疫反应加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员找到了一种联合免疫疗法，可以增强恶性胶质瘤患者的免疫反应，恶性胶质瘤是一种生长迅速且难以治疗的侵袭性脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Combination-immunotherapy-treatment-enhances-immune-response-for-people-with-malignant-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Combination-immunotherapy-treatment-enhances-immune-response-for-people-with-malignant-gliomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=513fc0b1-849c-45fc-81d1-2799e39a71c3 Thu, 09 May 2024 22:19:51 -0400 Combination immunotherapy treatment enhances immune response for people with malignant gliomas
专家在墨西哥发现干细胞治疗带来的高度耐药性感染国家犹太健康中心的分枝杆菌疾病专家与当地卫生部门和疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 合作，正在调查在前往墨西哥旅行的美国患者感染后可能爆发的高度耐药分枝杆菌（病菌）。干细胞注射得病了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Experts-identify-highly-drug-pressive-infections-from-stem-cell-treatments-In-Mexico.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Experts-identify-highly-drug-pressive-infections-from-stem-cell-treatments-In-Mexico.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8719f807-2784-4100-8f91-2f44444a8ce0 Thu, 09 May 2024 22:14:04 -0400 Experts identify highly drug-resistant infections from stem cell treatments In Mexico
PET 成像中的精准医疗：基于 AI 的衰减校正可增强患者护理2024 年 5 月 7 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“利用 Pix-2-Pix GAN 基于深度学习的全身 PSMA PET/CT 衰减校正”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Precision-medicine-in-PET-imaging-AI-based-attenuation- Correction-for-enhanced-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Precision-medicine-in-PET-imaging-AI-based-attenuation- Correction-for-enhanced-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab6e2490-af82-4776-9141-d7151af16771 Thu, 09 May 2024 22:06:47 -0400 Precision medicine in PET imaging: AI-based attenuation correction for enhanced patient care
生酮饮食通过重塑肠道细菌和大脑炎症来治疗自闭症改良生酮饮食可调节自闭症儿童的肠道微生物组、炎症标志物和大脑相关 miRNA，与行为症状的改善相关。这种饮食可以增加有益的肠道细菌并降低炎症细胞因子和 BDNF 水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Ketogenic-diet-a-potial-therapy-for-autism-by-reshaping-gut-bacteria-and-brain-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Ketogenic-diet-a-potial-therapy-for-autism-by-reshaping-gut-bacteria-and-brain-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22450fd2-98dc-4d46-97a5-1ca10bcb97c1 Thu, 09 May 2024 19:48:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet a potential therapy for autism by reshaping gut bacteria and brain inflammation
研究人员推出数字“酒精双胞胎”来预测饮酒风险并指导个性化干预数字孪生模型模拟现实生活中的饮酒模式，并将其与长期生物标志物联系起来，帮助电子健康策略遏制危险的饮酒习惯。该模型捕捉了食物、饮料和酒精代谢之间复杂的生理相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Researchers-unveil-digital-alcohol-twin-to-predict-drinking-risks-and-guide-personalized-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Researchers-unveil-digital-alcohol-twin-to-predict-drinking-risks-and-guide-personalized-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed217161-8b0d-459c-be78-8b8026e2e5fe Thu, 09 May 2024 19:36:00 -0400 Researchers unveil digital 'alcohol twin' to predict drinking risks and guide personalized interventions
研究发现酒精通过氧化应激对脑细胞造成损害酒精暴露会导致神经元细胞中氧化损伤的蛋白质积累。尽管分化细胞对细胞毒性具有更高的抵抗力，但更容易受到酒精诱导的氧化蛋白损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Study-uncovers-alcohols-damaging-effects-on-brain-cells-through-oxidative-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Study-uncovers-alcohols-damaging-effects-on-brain-cells-through-oxygen-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb1931de-8a1b-4766-9b1e-991f9a3f49f1 Thu, 09 May 2024 19:18:00 -0400 Study uncovers alcohol's damaging effects on brain cells through oxidative stress
研究表明蛋白质节律的改变与夜班工人的代谢紊乱有关仅仅几天夜班就会打乱与血糖调节、能量代谢和炎症相关的蛋白质节律，这些过程可能会影响慢性代谢疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Study-reveals-altered- Protein-rhythms-linked-to-metabolic-disorders-in-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Study-reveals-altered- Protein-rhythms-linked-to-metabolic-disorders-in-night-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1460d74-c068-4fcc-b911-7e5b6f26e693 Thu, 09 May 2024 14:21:29 -0400 Study reveals altered protein rhythms linked to metabolic disorders in night shift workers
UT Health San Antonio 领导开发针对衣原体的口服疫苗美国国立卫生研究院通过一项合作协议研究项目拨款（称为 U01 拨款），在五年内为一项可预防衣原体感染的新型口服疫苗的研究提供了约 1100 万美元的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/UT-Health-San-Antonio-leads-effort-for-developing-oral-vaccine-against-chlamydia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/UT-Health-San-Antonio-leads-effort-for-developing-oral-vaccine-against-chlamydia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f76a1cf-8243-49c4-a8e1-f769f02169cc Thu, 09 May 2024 14:16:03 -0400 UT Health San Antonio leads effort for developing oral vaccine against chlamydia
南加州大学护理学院成立，旨在促进护士的教育、领导力和卓越表现南加州大学凯克医学院成立了南加州大学护理学院，以促进护士的教育、领导力发展、临床专业知识和研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/USC-Nursing-Institute-launched-to-promote-education-leadership-and-excellence-among-nurses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/USC-Nursing-Institute-launched-to-promote-education-leadership-and-excellence-among-nurses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34cfa25b-e432-421a-9122-df2599b8bf87 Thu, 09 May 2024 14:08:46 -0400 USC Nursing Institute launched to promote education, leadership and excellence among nurses
